long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Sky Tab, a new tab extension for Chrome. This extension will replace Chrome's new tab page with the one from this extension.

On the new tab from top to bottom you will see:
• Preset links with icons
• An input field to add each link or use the search button for search results
• A circular button that you can use to load a new preset background
• A top sites button to show/hide the top sites you visit most often
• A dark button to toggle a dark background (useful at night)
• A transparency button to toggle a more transparent background
• The links you've added along with button's marked by an x that allow you to remove each link
